title: RUUFE
description: Web application for warehouse management developed for Ruufe, Latin America's #1 B2C e-commerce hub. Built comprehensive inventory management features and integrated seamlessly with their Shopify platform to streamline operations.

title: Facemark
description: Employee time tracking web application powered by AWS Rekognition facial recognition technology. Features automated clock-in/out through facial recognition, comprehensive metrics generation, and real-time attendance monitoring.

title: GioGroupe
description: Mobile application for GioGroupe, a premium cocktail and catering services company. Comprehensive event management system featuring client management, staff coordination, service scheduling, pricing management, detailed reporting, and user administration.

title: Papeleo
description: Document creation and editing web platform that enables users to generate and customize documents from templates. Features advanced document editing capabilities, template management, and integrated OpenAI functionality for enhanced document processing.

title: InverJara
description: Web application for managing and analyzing financial data. It allows you to upload information, view interactive graphs, pivot tables and export data in various formats.

title: Devs Learning
description: Platform to sell and take online courses, with features such as user management, course catalog and responsive design. Ideal for online learning.

title: Trip Boys Gang
description: Online store for TripBoysGang that allows you to manage products, place orders and handle high quality images, ideal for e-commerce.

title: Translate Clone
description: Web tool that replicates the functionality of Google Translate, allowing you to translate text in real time with a simple and efficient design.

title: Weather App
description: Application that provides real-time weather information for any location, with an intuitive interface and design adaptable to mobile devices.
